text:
Hi
In our HubSpot integration we listen to deal events.
1. Sometimes deal.creation event is coming bit late (2-3 minutes)
2. Is it guaranteed that for every deal creation event that we will get deal stage (property change) event as well?
pls explain. (consider we have subscribed both events)
thanks

<@U03FBDFC1DL> have you been able to successfully <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/quotes#associate-a-quote-template|Associate a quote template>? That doesn’t seem to be working for me. Keep getting 403 error. I’m using the templateId from the template dashboard url as well as the quoteId from the quote url
